title: Portket
data:
{"ops":[{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","size":"large"},"insert":"About Portket"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Portket is a web application designed to provide a platform for users to share and discover creative content. Whether you're an artist, photographer, designer, or any other type of creative individual, Portket aims to connect you with a community of like-minded people and showcase your work to the world."},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/website/Portket/portket_2.png"}},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/website/Portket/portket_1.png"}},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"header":2},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/website/Portket/portket_3.png"}},{"attributes":{"header":2},"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","size":"large"},"insert":"Features"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"User Authentication: Users can create accounts, log in, and log out securely."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Social Authentication: Users can log in using their Facebook or Google accounts."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Content Sharing: Users can upload and share their creative content, including images and other media files."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Content Discovery: Users can explore and discover creative content shared by other users."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Interactive Experience: The application provides an interactive and engaging user experience, with features such as likes, comments, and more."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Google Authentication: Users can log in using their Google accounts for streamlined access and security."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Responsive Design: Portket is designed to be responsive and accessible across various devices, including desktops, tablets, and smartphones."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","size":"large"},"insert":"Technologies"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Backend: Express.js, Sequelize (with MySQL database), Passport.js for authentication, dotenv for environment variables"},{"attributes":{"list":"ordered"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Frontend: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Handlebars.js for template"},{"attributes":{"list":"ordered"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Image Processing: Sharp.js for image processing"},{"attributes":{"list":"ordered"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"API Integration: Imgur API for image uploading"},{"attributes":{"list":"ordered"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Development Tools: Nodemon for automatic server restart, ESLint for code linting, Prettier for code formatting, Webpack for bundling assets"},{"attributes":{"list":"ordered"},"insert":"
"}]}
description: Portket is a website where users can share and discover creative content. With an intuitive interface, it allows for easy uploading and exploration of diverse projects, fostering a vibrant community of creators and viewers.

description: During university, two people created a project using UDK, Maya, Photoshop, and CrazyBump. It's a third-person shooter RPG in a robot world. Do you want to become the king of the arena? Then you have to kill, kill, kill your way to the top!

{"ops":[{"attributes":{"color":"#3d9be9","background":"transparent","size":"large","bold":true},"insert":"PROJECT ZEUS"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":"On the brink of Extinction, human scientists finally discovered a new form of "},{"attributes":{"color":"#3d9be9","background":"transparent"},"insert":"energy source"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":" from a distant planet. A black liquid-like organism, extracted from the planet's inner core, which is said to be able to maintain human life. Human soon starts construction of labs and workstations on the planet, it was then named "},{"attributes":{"color":"#3d9be9","background":"transparent"},"insert":"planet Zeus"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":"."},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":"Before human can extract energy from Zeus, the headquarter on Zeus lost connection with Earth. Three months later, a scouting ship arrived at Zeus, they found nothing, nothing besides a sentence written with blood that said: "},{"attributes":{"color":"#3d9be9","background":"transparent"},"insert":""It has been expecting us.""},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/old_concept/zeus/images_1.gif"}},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"background":"transparent","color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Project Zeus is a science horror survival game, set in a mining planet name Zeus. The player is on a mission to "},{"attributes":{"background":"transparent","color":"#3d9be9"},"insert":"find survivor "},{"attributes":{"background":"transparent","color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"on the planet and discover what happened."},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"background":"transparent","color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"In Project Zeus, your enemy is also your weapon and life. The Black-creature is a slim like organism that will try to absorb any life near it, however, when contained, it is also the "},{"attributes":{"background":"transparent","color":"#3d9be9"},"insert":"energy source"},{"attributes":{"background":"transparent","color":"#ffffff"},"insert":" that power your weapon and armor."},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/old_concept/zeus/images_19.jpg"}},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"background":"transparent","color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"The story follows a traveler that had lost in a strange fog and now finds himself in a strange island. He will have to discover where he is and how to get out of this place before something even more strange happened."},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/old_concept/others/images_18.jpg"}},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"color":"#fcbf3a","size":"large","bold":true},"insert":"Puzzel : Door"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":"Player’s boat was caught up some strange fog and now he is on this island. In front of him is an ancient ruin with a giant stone door that’s blocking the entrance. There is some kind of a puzzle on the stone door, with some strange writing on it. withPlayer will have to solve the puzzle in order to open the door."},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":"​"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":"Player has to solve the stone door puzzle. The goal is to move the sinning stone on the top right to the bottom, where there is a space with the same symbol on it."},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"align":"center"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"height":"99.49%","width":"50.90%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/old_concept/others/images_35.png"}},{"attributes":{"align":"center"},"insert":"
"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#fcbf3a","size":"large","bold":true},"insert":"Puzzel : Ruin"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"background":"transparent","color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"When the player gets in to the ruin he soon realizes that the exit to the upper floor is block by some stones. When he was searching for another way to get up to that strange tree he find a diary next to a dead body. It tells how the author got on this island, and for some reason had been locks in side this ruin by someone."},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"background":"transparent","color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Suddenly there are some noises at the entrance, when the player turns he see two dark figures closing the door behind him. Now the player has to find a way out of this place. Player soon realizes there is some light coming form below the dead body. It seems to be another room below this, and it maybe the only way out of this place."},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"height":"91.82%","width":"56.12%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/old_concept/others/images_31.png"}},{"attributes":{"align":"center"},"insert":"

title: Charlulu's Shop
data:
{"ops":[{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","size":"huge"},"insert":"Frontend"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Charlulu Shop Frontend is the front-end service for the Charlulu Shop. It provides a user interface for buyers to interact with the e-commerce features of the Charlulu Shop website."},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#fdf517"},"insert":"⚠️ Important Note: Please be aware that this project does not handle payment transactions. It is designed solely for order management and email notifications to both buyers and sellers."},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/website/Charlulu/charlulu_react_1.png"}},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/website/Charlulu/charlulu_react_2.png"}},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","size":"large"},"insert":"Features"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"User Authentication: Secure login and registration."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Product Browsing: Browse available products with images, descriptions, prices, and stock information."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Shopping Cart: Add, remove, and manage items in the shopping cart."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Order Placement: Place orders for selected items with quantity selection and payment options."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Order Tracking: View and track order status and history."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"React Hash Router: Utilize React Hash Router to simulate URL changes for enhanced user experience."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"YouTube Integration: Display the newest YouTube video from the seller's channel. The backend server fetches data from the YouTube API to provide the latest video."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Responsive Design: Optimized for various screen sizes, including mobile and desktop devices."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","size":"large"},"insert":"Technologies"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"React: Frontend library for building user interfaces."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"React Router: Routing library for navigating between pages."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"SweetAlert2: Library for customizable alerts and modals."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Vite: Next-generation frontend tooling for development and build processes."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","size":"huge"},"insert":"Backend"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Charlulu Shop Backend is the backend server for the Charlulu Shop React site. It provides the necessary functionality and endpoints to support features of the Charlulu Shop react website."},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/website/Charlulu/charlulu_backend_1.png"}},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/website/Charlulu/charlulu_backend_2.png"}},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","size":"large"},"insert":"Features"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Authentication: Secure login/logout."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Authorization: Access control for endpoints."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Data Storage: Store product/user info, orders."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"CRUD Items: Manage items with attributes like image, name, description, price, and stock."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"CRUD Tags: Associate tags with each item."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"CRUD Orders: Manage buyer orders, including creation, viewing, updating, and deletion."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"YouTube Integration: Display the newest YouTube video from the seller's channel. Provides hourly updates and sends video data to the React site."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Email Notifications: Nodemailer for order alerts, see "},{"attributes":{"color":"#fb4646","link":"https://github.com/klu0926/charlulushop-backend?tab=readme-ov-file"},"insert":"example"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":" <-"},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","size":"large"},"insert":"Technologies"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Backend Framework: Express.js"},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Frontend: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Handlebars.js for template"},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Database ORM: Sequelize (with MySQL database)"},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Environment Variables: dotenv"},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Image Handling: Sharp for optimized resizing, Multer for media uploads."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"YouTube Integration: Google API for fetching latest shop video."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Email Service: Nodemailer for order alerts."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS): Core for frontend-backend integration."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"insert":"
"}]}
description: Charlulu's Shop is a website for selling second-hand items. Buyers can easily browse and order items, receiving email notifications upon checkout. Sellers use a backend dashboard to track orders and their statuses.

title: EnGaming
data:
{"ops":[{"attributes":{"color":"#f46010","size":"huge"},"insert":"About EnGaming"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Created with a dear classmate during our time at the University of Waterloo, "},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","bold":true},"insert":"EnGaming"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":" shares and aggregates gamification news and trends worldwide. From case studies to gamified apps, MyEnGaming brings you the most inspiring posts and articles to feed your curiosity!"},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/Engaming/cover.png"}},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"color":"#f46010","size":"large"},"insert":"Gamification"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Gamification is the process of incorporating game-like elements, such as points, badges, and leaderboards, into non-game contexts to enhance engagement and motivation. It is often used in various fields like education, marketing, and workplace productivity to make tasks more enjoyable and rewarding, thereby encouraging desired behaviors and outcomes."},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"height":"173.49%","width":"57.58%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/Engaming/images_1.jpg"}},{"attributes":{"align":"center"},"insert":"
"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"size":"large","color":"#f46010"},"insert":"Who is it for ?"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"MyEnGaming is for gamer, businessman, marketer, blogger, manager, entrepreneur, consultant, director, teacher, doctor, journalist, and basically anyone that is trying to be more engaging and influence other’s behavior. MyEnGaming is here for you, and for all your Gamification needs! Prepare to be engaged!"},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"color":"#f4600f","size":"large"},"insert":"Topics"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"We group topics into App, Case Studies, Gamification Experts and Sneak Peek. "},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","bold":true},"insert":"App"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":": Gamification apps ("},{"attributes":{"color":"#f4600f","link":"https://engaming.wordpress.com/2015/10/30/bacteria-combat-fight-the-good-fight-with-antibiotic/"},"insert":"Bacteria Combat"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":")"},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","bold":true},"insert":"Case Studies"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":":  Success stories  ("},{"attributes":{"color":"#f4600f","link":"https://engaming.wordpress.com/2012/07/19/the-birth-of-an-idea-code-army-marches-on-part-i/"},"insert":"Code Army"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":")"},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","bold":true},"insert":"Experts"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":": Influencers ("},{"attributes":{"color":"#f4600f","link":"https://engaming.wordpress.com/2012/06/21/gamification-just-a-fad-not-so-says-expert/"},"insert":"Gabe Zichermann"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":")"},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","bold":true},"insert":"Sneak Peek"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":":  Stories and news (e.g: "},{"attributes":{"color":"#f4600f","link":"https://engaming.wordpress.com/2012/07/14/next-berlin-love-in-times-of-gamification-with-alper-cugun/"},"insert":"Alper Çuğun"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":")"},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#f46010","size":"large"},"insert":"Ancient Badge Board"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"One feature we offer is a badge board that rewards readers or those who interact with us on Twitter. When someone earns a badge, it's "discovered" by them and permanently displayed on our badge board alongside their Twitter handle. Implementing badge systems is common on websites today, but back in 2011, it was still a novel concept."},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"height":"108.77%","width":"55.67%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/Engaming/badge_board_1.webp"}},{"attributes":{"align":"center"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"height":"133.16%","width":"56.03%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/Engaming/badge_board_2.webp"}},{"attributes":{"align":"center"},"insert":"
"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#f46010","size":"large"},"insert":"What happened to it?"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"The blog remained stagnant for a year after my classmate and I parted ways. I tried to continue the work for another year, but due to various reasons, it has now become a thing of the past. I missed the good old days."},{"insert":"
"}]}
description: In grad school, a classmate and I created a gamification blog. It covers gamified products, services, and companies. Designed with WordPress, and did all the art work.

title: Portfolio

For database management, it utilizes MySQL with "},{"attributes":{"color":"#54dcf8"},"insert":"Sequelize"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":", and for secure image storage, it relies on "},{"attributes":{"color":"#54dcf8"},"insert":"Amazon S3"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":". Multer handles file uploads, "},{"attributes":{"color":"#54dcf8"},"insert":"Quill"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":" enables rich text editing, and Webpack along with Nodemon streamlines development. "},{"attributes":{"color":"#54dcf8"},"insert":"Tinify"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":" and "},{"attributes":{"color":"#54dcf8"},"insert":"youtube-embed"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":" improve image and video handling, while "},{"attributes":{"color":"#54dcf8"},"insert":"Day.js"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":" ensures accurate date and time management."},{"insert":"

The bucket page allows for CRUD operations on all current files and folders."},{"insert":"

"},{"insert":"

Uploaded images are first compressed using "},{"attributes":{"color":"#54dcf8"},"insert":"Tinify"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":", then stored in the S3 database, and finally added to the current image list for use."},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/website/myPortfolio/backend-editor-upload.png"}},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"header":3},"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Embedding YouTube videos is straightforward with the "},{"attributes":{"color":"#54dcf8"},"insert":"youtube-embed"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":" package, enhancing the multimedia capabilities of the portfolio. This allows easy embedding of YouTube links into posts."},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","size":"large"},"insert":"Database Management"},{"attributes":{"header":3},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"MySQL, managed via Sequelize, handles database operations for project details. Custom scripts for migrations, seeding, and backups ensure data integrity and easy initialization."},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","size":"large"},"insert":"Clients Page (new)"},{"attributes":{"header":3},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"The clients page is primarily used for live messaging with clients. It shows whether clients are online and allows the admin to easily send and receive messages in real-time. This feature is built with Socket.io, ensuring that all messages are instantly delivered."},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/website/myPortfolio/server-clients-page-all-users.png"}},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/website/myPortfolio/server-clients-chat.png"}},{"insert":"
"}]}
description: This is the website you're currently using. It uses React for the frontend, Node.js for the backend, Amazon S3 for image storage, MySQL for project details, and Quill for post formatting.

title: YouTube Comment Picker
data:
{"ops":[{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","size":"huge"},"insert":"About"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"The YouTube Comment Picker is designed to randomly selecting comments from your YouTube videos, this tool makes it easy to choose winners and create exciting content for your followers, making it perfect for conducting "},{"attributes":{"color":"#ff5252"},"insert":"giveaways"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":", selecting contest winners, or simply engaging with your audience in a fun and interactive manner."},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/website/comment-picker-new/cover.png"}},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"header":3},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"size":"large","color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Features"},{"attributes":{"header":3},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"This application is packed with features to enhance your YouTube experience:"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ff5252","bold":true},"insert":"YouTube Integration"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","bold":true},"insert":":"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":" Seamlessly fetch comments from any YouTube video using its URL."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ff5252","bold":true},"insert":"Random Comment Selection"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","bold":true},"insert":":"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":" Pick a comment at random from the fetched comments, ensuring fairness in your contests."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ff5252","bold":true},"insert":"Responsive Design"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","bold":true},"insert":":"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":" Optimized for both desktop and mobile use, so you can engage with your audience on the go."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ff5252","bold":true},"insert":"Channel Storage"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","bold":true},"insert":":"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":" Save your most frequently used YouTube channels for quick and easy access."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ff5252","bold":true},"insert":"Newest Videos"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","bold":true},"insert":":"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":" Quickly select from the 5 most recent videos of your stored channels."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/website/comment-picker-new/home.png"}},{"insert":"

"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/website/comment-picker-new/add.png"}},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Add current video's channel to storage"},{"attributes":{"align":"center"},"insert":"
"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/website/comment-picker-new/cover-list-full.png"}},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Pick from thes newest videos"},{"attributes":{"align":"center"},"insert":"
"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/website/comment-picker-new/winner.png"}},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Randomly select a winner"},{"attributes":{"align":"center"},"insert":"
"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","size":"large"},"insert":"Behind the Tool"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"The YouTube Comment Picker is built using a robust set of technologies to ensure a smooth and efficient user experience:"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ff5252","bold":true},"insert":"Backend"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","bold":true},"insert":":"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":" Powered by Express.js and dotenv for handling environment variables."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ff5252","bold":true},"insert":"Frontend"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","bold":true},"insert":":"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":" Developed with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create a responsive and user-friendly interface."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ff5252","bold":true},"insert":"API Integration"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","bold":true},"insert":":"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":" Utilizes the YouTube Data API to fetch comments from videos seamlessly."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ff5252","bold":true},"insert":"Development"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","bold":true},"insert":" "},{"attributes":{"color":"#ff5252","bold":true},"insert":"Tools"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","bold":true},"insert":":"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":" Nodemon is employed to automatically restart the server during development, making the process more efficient."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"insert":"
"}]}
description: YouTube Comment Picker is a web application designed to randomly select a comment from a YouTube video. This tool is useful for giveaways, contests, or simply engaging with your audience by picking random comments from your videos.
